variations.description: Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for 180% of Croche's ATK.
Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for 210% of Croche's ATK.
Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for 240% of Croche's ATK.
Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for 270% of Croche's ATK.
Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for 300% of Croche's ATK.
Removes debuffs from all allies. For the next 10 seconds, increases allies' Crit Chance by 1.2% each time they deal Physical DMG, up to 12%.
Removes debuffs from all allies. For the next 10 seconds, increases allies' Crit Chance by 1.4% each time they deal Physical DMG, up to 14%.
Removes debuffs from all allies. For the next 10 seconds, increases allies' Crit Chance by 1.6% each time they deal Physical DMG, up to 16%.
Removes debuffs from all allies. For the next 10 seconds, increases allies' Crit Chance by 1.8% each time they deal Physical DMG, up to 18%.
Removes debuffs from all allies. For the next 10 seconds, increases allies' Crit Chance by 2% each time they deal Physical DMG, up to 20%.
Croche has a 10% chance to fully restore her Health when it drops to 0.
Croche has a 20% chance to fully restore her Health when it drops to 0.
